doc.title: Junior Almost Anything Goes
doc.plot: A Saturday morning kid's version of the popular game and novelty show "Almost Anything Goes". Like their parents on the other program, kids would compete against each other in bizarre competitions in the hopes of qualifying for the regional, and later national, championhsips. Different types of competitions were held each week, but the contests typically involved grease, food, eggs, or anything else that looked unpleasant enough when the contestants got covered in it.
